ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Hi all
ygData.msgSnippet: get a shovel off the ground in lake rathe at the orc camp, you will look silly as hell when you fight but it will bring your skill up fast. I got my skill up
ygData.messageBody:
get a shovel off the ground in lake rathe at the orc camp, you will look silly as hell when you fight but it will bring your skill up fast. I got my skill up to 80 in two days play. I am only level 35 though, most of the people I have been playing with are twinks and don't seem to care if I fight with a shovel. I even fought hill giants with the shovel yesterday, I think ill do that again tommorow and then go buy a decent 2hb in GFay. Just be sure to have another weapon on you if you run into trouble.
----- Original Message -----
From: erik
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thursday, April 11, 2002 4:40 AM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Hi all

> From: "J. Smythe" <lgumaer@...>
>
> I am sure there are some good ranger 2-hand blunt weapons out there.

Yes there are.  But the problem with 2hb is that there are so many better
weapons for the other weapons types that you rarely find a good 2hb to work
up your skill until the later levels.  I have 200+ skill in 1 and 2hs, 1hb,
and piercing but I've never found a 2hb weapon that I could raise skill
with.  Maybe I'll get lucky and win a roll on a Woodsman's staff one day and
be able to use that.

There are good 2hb weapons......it's just that there are so many other
better weapons that are easier to get.
